titleStmt.title: Samuel Cross to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG1727

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
To His Excellency
The Governor of Kentucky

The Undersigned, for 12 Years a resident of Sacramento City California and a practising attorney & Notary Public therein, respectfully petitions your Excellency for an appointment as Commissioner of Deeds &c in this place for your State. If granted I will endeavor to discharge my Duties with faithfulness & accuracy

Very Respectfully
Your Obt Servt
Samuel Cross

We the Subscribers, citizen of the City of Sacramento State of California, from long and intimate acquaintance and intercourse with Mr. Samuel Cross, Cordially recommend his appointment to the office he Seeks. His business habits Integrity & Loyalty render him well qualified & it is a Safe appointment & needed here

Robt C Clark
County Judge Sacramento County
Jno H McKeene
Dist Judge 6th Dist
E. B. Crochers
Justice of Supreme Court.
